titleInfo.title: Country Music Awards interviews - Biff Collie - 1966

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Recording of various artist and music industry representative interviews, conducted by Biff Collie and the 1966 Country Music Award show.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
